Package eus.klimu.location.api

Class LocationController

java.lang.Object
eus.klimu.location.api.LocationController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/location")
public class LocationController
extends java.lang.Object
Create, update, delete and get information for the Notifications. They represent the different places the notifications can come from. Takes care of all the CRUD methods, working with the database through an internal Service.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private LocationService locationService
    A class that allows modifying the different locations.

  • Method Details

    • getLocationByCity

      @GetMapping(value="/{id}", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Location> getLocationByCity​(@PathVariable long id)

      Get a location by its ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/location/{id}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the location to look for.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the location was found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.

    • createLocation

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Location> createLocation​(@RequestBody LocationDTO location)

      Save a new location on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/location/create

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      location - The location that is going to be stored.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the location was saved on the database or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.
